resources.string:
Sometimes jaltrack does not ring at scheduled time, because of cleaner appsor phone system shut off jaltrack.

If you have installed cleaner apps like CM security, please make sure they do not stop jaltrack.

Some devices such as SamSung, have strict power plans, the system will shut off jaltrack after locking your screen. We suggest you add jaltrack to the unmonitored apps list to avoid missing reminders.

We have created apps with respect to user's privacy. Our apps does not collect any data or information from the phone or user. But to make apps work properly we sometimes request permissions for: 

 1) Access WIFI for showing ads inside the app
 2) Read external storage

With Jaltrack app: This permission is used only to access your phone for reminders.
